title: Old Judges for Trade or Sale
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Old Judges for Trade or Sale
posts.post_content:
Looking to swap the three cards below for similarly conditioned ones of players I do not already have. 

Also wouldn't mind a multi-card swap for players like Frank Graves, Frank Hankinson, W. J. Jordan, Fred Lange, Kid Madden (pose 288-7), Joe Miller (except pose pose 324-2), Dave Rowe, or Frank Scheibeck. 

If you want to buy:

Holliday $325 delivered  ***SOLD***
Decker  $180 delivered  ***SOLD***
Turner  $150 delivered
Shaw   $285 delivered   ***TRADED***

I need Browning.  I could find something on your list.    

Lmk

cheers,   

[url]Tp7161@yahoo.com[/url]

Toby:

The available items for trade are Decker, Holliday and Turner. 

If I had a Browning for trade......oh, the possibilities! :)

Kevin
kevin pretty cards good luck,,:)

Post or PM me a price for the Bug Holliday if you decide to sell.

Thanks.
...to add prices.
Bump
When did you add Jimmy Williams to your wantlist, when I picked up one? :)

Kevin,

I have a Denny sgc 84 that might fill a gap in your collection?
...I already have a Denny, Toby.

I'll take the Williamson and Mascot for $320 delivered.

And the McCormick for $180.

Thanks in advance.

J
LOL--is this like the park bench of the BST area?

[quote name="cyseymour" post=1189757]I'll take the Williamson and Mascot for $320 delivered.

And the McCormick for $180.

Thanks in advance.[/QUOTE]

Jamie:

I'll take the Scheibeck or the Miller for Holliday, Decker and Turner even up or the Carney for $150 delivered.

Let me know.

Kevin
After you win the Cusick from REA, I'll take your extra Cushman. Thanks
Bump...new card added
Great price on the Shaw. That is a scarce card. Good luck!
Geez - then maybe I should raise my price or you could trade me something for it! Got an extra Handsome Jack Carney? :D
I need a Browning.  Anyone got one?  And a Browning cabinet......
Come on, Tom. You live in Browning country. They must be for sale on every street corner down there! :D
Did you get a Browning from me?  I had 3 different poses.  I know where (2) went and wonder if they're still there but not 100% sure about the third........

Nope. I got mine from the dearly departed Norris Mauritson.

I subsequently swapped it with Tom Mills since I had a pose he needed and I didn't care which pose I had.
Hence where 2/3 of mine went.........

Just traded the Shaw, so that beautiful, but underpriced Turner is the last one left.

Anyone got a similarly conditioned Old Judge to swap?

Just traded the Shaw, so that beautiful, but underpriced Turner is the last one left.

Anyone got a similarly conditioned Old Judge to swap?

Mr. Turner is very sad that I don't want him any more, so I am still trying to find him a new home.

Anyone want to buy him or make a trade?
